General.Name: Financiera Independencia S.A.B. de C.V. SOFOM E.N.R
General.Description: Financiera Independencia S.A.B. de C.V. SOFOM E.N.R., a non-bank entity, offers micro-lending services in Mexico and internationally. The company provides loans to individuals with low income and minimum wage, informal sector, mothers, and employees, as well as group loans. It also offers insurance products; administrative services; and call center, promotion, and marketing services, as well as other services. In addition, the company engages in the acquisition of collection rights of the consumer loan portfolio. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Prolong. Paseo de la Reforma No. 600, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 01210
